game.name: The Adventurer’s Trial
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, LAN Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Every adventurer must face the Trial — a boundless pixel-art sandbox where you can explore, build, mine, farm, and challenge epic bosses. Play solo or with up to 3 friends in thrilling top-down adventures.
